K,a = number_field(4215317277625269911886087481186282364545350008724105375307357 + 21419838278256613786933290643691245615139353731710465033 * x + 57200825113145835090170467281418971366309078154117 * x * x + 88552326907743897428480749665264720838892177 * x * x * x + 90302878119153132714621297420064494253 * x * x * x * x + 65334109486103882951323278034981 * x * x * x * x * x + 51978250634771581407574193 * x * x * x * x * x * x + 40098756158591634061 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + 22294560183801 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + 6848437 * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x + x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x * x);
K2 = simplify(K)[1];
writedlm("/home/gert/Projects/MultFreeCenters/Mathematica/simplerfields" * string(861) * ".txt", string(defining_polynomial(K2)));
